SELECT EM.EMP_NO AS empNo , EM.EMP_ENG_NM AS empEngNm , EM.EMP_NM AS empNm , EM.DEPT_CD AS deptCd , DM.DEPT_NM AS deptNm , EM.RGNTN_YN AS rgntnYn , EM.DEPT_RL_NM AS deptRlNm , EM.LCET_NO AS lcetNo , EM.EMAL_ADDR AS emalAddr , EM.GRAD AS grad , EM.DUTY_TTL_NM AS dutyTtlNm , EM.CHG_YN AS chgYn , EM.GRP_NAME AS grpName , EM.ID_NM AS idNm FROM EMP_MNGM EM LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPT_MNGM DM ON EM.DEPT_CD = DM.DEPT_CD WHERE 1=1
